Package lspsim

Class Summary
Association Association class describes the Links associated with each node
CommonHeader This class stores the common header used by all OSPF packets
ConfigParser ConfigParser class does the parsing of config.txt and constructs the related data-structures & parameters
DDPacket This class implements the DD Header
HelloPacket This class implements the HelloHeader
Interface This class implements the Interface data-structure
Link This class implements the Link data-structure
LSAckPacket This class implements the Link state Acknowledgement Header (LSAck)
LSAPacket This class implements the Link State Advertisement (LSA) Header
LSHeader This class implements the Link state Common Header (LSH)
LSRPacket This class implements the Protocol Common Header
LSUPacket This class implements the Link state Update Header (LSU)
Main This is the main simulator class
Neighbour This class implements the Neighbour data-structure
NetworkServer This class implements the simulation underlying point-to-point network
Node This class implements a generic Node in a network
Router This class implements the Router
 

Enum Summary
Interface.InterfaceState_s Interface State
Interface.InterfaceType_s Enumeration for Interface Type
